<?php
/**
 * Image
 *
 * @package phenotype
 * @subpackage application
 */
class PhenotypeComponent_1102 extends PhenotypeComponent
{
	public $com_id = 1102;
	public $name  ="Image";

	function setDefaultProperties()
	{
		$this->set("_revision",1);
	}


	public function initForm($context)
	{
		// Customize input form with form_xy-methods

		$this->form_image_selector("","image1","",true,0,0,0,Array("altandalign"=>true));
	}


	function render($context)
	{
		if ($this->getI("image1_img_id")!=0)
		{
			switch ($this->get("image1_align"))
			{
				case "left":
					$style = "float:left";
					break;
				case "right":
					$style = "float:right";
					break;
				case "center":
					$style = "";
					break;
			}

			$myImg = new PhenotypeImage($this->getI("image1_img_id"));
			$myImg->style = $style;
			$image = $myImg->render($this->get("image1_alt"));
			if ($this->get("image1_alt")=="center")
			{
				$image = "<center>". $image ."</center>";
			}
			
			// Initialize template access (=>$mySmarty)
			eval ($this->initRendering());
			$mySmarty->assign("image",$image);
			return $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_1);
		}
		return "";
	}

}
